name: Gil_Sontain
content:
Gil Sontain was a male Human living in New Adasta on Ziost during the Galactic War. In 3636 BBY the former Sith Emperor Vitiate came to the world and possessed many of the Imperials on the planet, turning them into his puppets to murder civilians. After the Galactic Republic began landing on Ziost, Gil Sontain was along with Ecko-Do seen near the People's Tower.
Gil Sontain was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan in game update 3.2.
